name: easy-fixer
description: This is a monorepo that contains all the apps related to Easy Fixer, which is a platform to connect clients with in-your-location service providers such as handymans.
author: Easy Fixer

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w web"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build -w api" "npm run build -w web"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start -w api" "npm run start -w web"
scripts.check:staged: npx lint-staged && npm run check:type -w api
scripts.lint:check: concurrently "npm run check:type -w api" "npm run lint -w api" "npm run lint -w web"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "npm run lint:fix -w api" "npm run lint:fix -w web"
scripts.test: npm run test -w api && npm run test -w web
scripts.test:coverage: cd apps/api && npm run test:coverage && cd ../web && npm run test:coverage
scripts.preinstall: npm run db:dev:down -w api && npm run db:dev:up -w api
scripts.prepare: husky && node scripts/setup-env.js && npm run setup:db -w api && node scripts/setup-nav.js
scripts.clean:all: concurrently "npx rimraf node_modules" "npm run clean -w api" "npm run clean -w web"
scripts.clean:all:deep: npx rimraf package-lock.json && npm run clean:all
